amendment.description: Amendment sought to make authorization of appropriations subject to pay as you go provisions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to amend section 6 of the bill to make authorization of appropriations subject to pay as you go provisions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Roskam.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
